resources.string:
Use your device\'s GPS to find a special location in the real world.
There will be three sites you will need to visit, and you will be given a clue for each one of them.
When you think you are close to the site described in the clue, click the "found it!" button.
When you correctly guess the location, you will receive a new clue for the next location.
Once you successfully find the last location, you will win the game and can share your time.
